`teckfish` is an R package for Teck Fish and Aquatic Sciences Projects.

## Installation
```r
# install.packages("pak", repos = sprintf("https://r-lib.github.io/p/pak/stable/%s/%s/%s", .Platform$pkgType, R.Version()$os, R.Version()$arch))
pak::pak("poissonconsulting/teckfish")
```


## Example

`calculate_gsdd()` takes a numerical vector of daily temperature values and 
calculates the growing season degree days (GSDD). 
```{r}
library(teckfish)
day <- 1:365
x <- pmax(-15 * cos((2*pi / 365) * (day-10)) + rnorm(365, sd = .5), 0)

calculate_gsdd(x)
```
